Priest of the Earth Daychir:
That's right, that's good - find out all the details about the job. Be aware, the problem is not simple. Eliminate Earthworm Trask is not so easy. He is an incredibly powerful adversary, to fight him at the peak of his powers is meaningless.
So we have to strike a decisive blow at a time when the influence of Shilen on this thing weakens. To do this, we gather under the banners of all the Dwarves who live in the surrounding lands.
